channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New session at TechCrunch All Stage: Jahanvi Sardana on how top startups reshape markets

item.title: The Blunt Force Trauma of the Trump Tariffs
item.description: The US is barreling toward a recession for no good reason, and dragging the world—and a few thousand penguins on remote Antarctic islands—down with it...

item.title: Voice AI platform Phonic gets backing from Lux

item.title: What to know about TikTok’s uncertain future in the US and the people who want to buy it
item.description: TikTok, owned by the Chinese company ByteDance, has been at the center of controversy in the U.S. for four years now due to concerns about user data p...

item.title: We Played With the Nintendo Switch 2. It's Refined but Unsurprising
item.description: Nintendo's pricey new Switch 2 has been updated to create a product that feels both familiar and improved. WIRED spent some time with it.

item.title: It Might Be Time to Ditch Your Emotional Support Hoodie
item.description: The hoodie is a work-from-home security blanket. But in the office, it’s a trap.

item.title: Audio-Technica ATH-CKS50TW2 Earbuds Review: Max Power
item.description: These mid-tier earbuds have 15 hours of battery life with noise canceling, and a magnetic design that keeps them charged—no case required.

item.title: Call for speakers: Showcase your knowledge at TechCrunch All Stage
item.description: Calling founders, VCs, and startup experts — share your scaling strategies! TechCrunch All Stage 2025 is assembling top minds in startups and venture ...

item.title: 12 Best Umbrellas (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These are the best umbrellas we’ve tested. They’ll protect you from showers and heavy rain and will hold up for the long haul.

item.title: Spotify debuts Gen AI ads, programmatic ad buying
